summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Bath Brush, Bamboo Bath Brush for Back Scrubber ESARORA Soft Natural Bristles Back Brush with Long Handle for Exfoliating Skin & Wood Beads for Massage - Use Wet or Dry - Suitable for Men and Women Review Date: 2017/03/10 Store: Esarora Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Material': 'Boar bristle, Bamboo', 'Brand': 'Esarora', 'Color': 'Yellow, Bath Brush', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '16.14 x 2.2 x 3.15 inches', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Massage,Promote Blood Circulation,Pores,Exfoliating,Blood Flow,Blood Circulation,Dirt', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '16.14 x 2.2 x 3.15 inches; 8.43 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'A1', 'UPC': '759218239978', 'Manufacturer': 'ESARORA'} Review Text: Brush has bee great after 2 months of usage. Review Title: Five Stars Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: OULAC Shine to Shine Moisture Shine Lipstick, Glossy Finish, Vegan Friendly, 2.2 grams / 0.07 ounces, # (09) Review Date: 2021/10/26 Store: Oulac Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Oulac', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Product Benefits': 'Nourishing,Moisturizing', 'Product Dimensions': '3.84 x 0.59 x 0.59 inches; 1.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'moistureshine-lipstick-09'} Review Text: This lipstick goes on sheer and very shiny, but the color still shows vibrant. I also like that it moisturizes your lips.

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product. I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. Review Title: Sheer and Shiny Lipstick Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 21Pcs Dip Powder Nail Kit - Aubss 10 Colors Dip Nail Kit, Neutral Skin Tone Dipping Powder Colors Kit, Dip Powder for French Nail Art Nail Manicure Kit Salon DIY Home, No Nail Lamp Needed Review Date: 2021/11/21 Store: AUBSS Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'AUBSS', 'Included Components': 'Dip Powder', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Product Dimensions': '8.94 x 8.23 x 1.73 inches; 1.29 Pounds'} Review Text: This dip power set is a great idea for gifting this holiday season. It comes with everything you’d need to learn how to use dip powder, even brings cuticle oil! The blue set brings a nice variety of colors, from pink to blue and some glittery one too. Highly recommended!

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product. I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. Review Title: Nice Starter Kit Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Veda Tinda Gel Nail Polish Kit 20 Colors Fall Winter Modern Stage Soak off UV/LED Lamp Nail Polish Set with Glossy & Matte Top Coat and Base Coat Christmas Review Date: 2021/12/03 Store: veda Tinda Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'veda Tinda', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'base', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy, Matte', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Unit Count': '3.50 Fl Oz', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '10.63 x 3.98 x 3.94 inches; 1.81 Pounds'} Review Text: This set brings a great selection of colors that work well for special occasions since it has neutral pinks, mauve, burgundies, blues and many shades of grays/silver. It’s my go-to set for when I need to glam up for a wedding or nighttime party.

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product. I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. Review Title: Glamorous Nail Colors Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Aubss 20Pcs Colors Gel Nail Polish Kit with Glossy & Matte Top Coat and 2Pcs Base Coat, Rainbow Colors Skin Tones Yellow Red Gel Polish for All Reason, Gel Nail Kit for Women Girls Christmas Gift Review Date: 2022/02/23 Store: AUBSS Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AUBSS', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': '003', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Glossy', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '25', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '7.87 x 5.51 x 2.76 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '7.87 x 5.51 x 2.76 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'AUBSS'} Review Text: This gel nail polish set contains a great selection of 20 colors, and includes the base and glossy & matte top coats. I used the red polish on my toenails and so far they have lasted over 2 weeks without issues. However (at least with the red polish), the color goes on a bit transparent so you would definitely need 2 coats of color. Overall, it’s highly recommended!

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product.  I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. Review Title: Affordable Selection of Gel Colors Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: AIFAIFA 9Pcs Gel Nail Polish Set, Burgundy Nail Polish Kits Red Colors Soak Off UV/LED Nail Polish Set, Gel Polish with Base Coat & Glossy & Matte Top All-Season Salon Manicure Art Design Red Review Date: 2022/03/23 Store: AIFAIFA Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Burgundy,Red', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy, Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic', 'Unit Count': '9.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 4.21 x 2.83 inches; 11.99 Ounces'} Review Text: This small set is perfect to add more shades of reds to your collection of gel polishes. Two coats and the color looks rich and vibrant. I also appreciate that it comes with glossy and matte top coats to change it up. I cure the base, color and top coats for 60 seconds each in my UV/LED lamp and it’s lasted for a week without chipping.

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product.  I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. Review Title: Great Selection of Reds Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Solflower SPF 30 Sunscreen Lotion - Broad Spectrum, UVA/UVB Protection - PABA-Free, Oil-Free - 3.36 Fl Oz Review Date: 2022/03/23 Store: Solflower Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Sun Protection Factor': '30 Sun Protection Factor (SPF)', 'Unit Count': '3.36 Fl Oz', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Solflower', 'Package Dimensions': '5.08 x 1.93 x 1.89 inches; 5.93 Ounces', 'Item model number': '860006763404', 'UPC': '860006763404'} Review Text: I use this sunscreen when I go out walking during my 1.5 hour exercise routine and it is sweat resistant and oil free. The product works well and has protected my face from a rosacea outbreak.

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product. I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. Review Title: Oil Free Sunscreen Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Vegan Mia - USDA Organic Radiance Superfruit Cleansing Oil and Make-up Remover, Oil Cleanser and Makeup Remover Oil for Dry Skin and Other Skin Types, Loaded with Moisturizer Essential Fatty Acids, Rich in Antioxidants, Truly Natural Skincare, (With No Added Fragrance) 3.4 fl oz Review Date: 2022/04/04 Store: Vegan Mia Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Vegan Mia', 'Scent': 'Natural aroma of fruit oils - No fragrance added', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '6.34 x 1.77 x 1.73 inches; 9.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '762530483363', 'Manufacturer': 'Vegan Mia'} Review Text: This Vegan, Superfruit oil works well as a makeup remover and also helps hydrate my dry skin. Lately I’ve been using superfruit oils and I’ve found they keep my skin moisturized longer than using other serums.  It is pricey compared to other products in the market but the natural ingredients may be worth the extra money!

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product. I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. Review Title: Pricey But Works Well Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mocossmy Cross Nail Art Charms Decoration,72 PCS Gold Silver 3D Mini Metal Punk Vintage Cross Designs Mixed Types Retro Acrylic Nail Jewelry Accessories for Women Girls DIY Manicure Crafts Decoration Review Date: 2022/05/27 Store: Mocossmy Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {} Review Text: I got these nail charms to do my nails for a “throwback” 80s and 90s costume party and they were a big hit! I like that they come in either gold or silver to give you options. The little details count!

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product.  I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. Review Title: Cute Charms! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Builder Gel Nail Kit -2 oz Clear&Pink Nail Extension Gel Big Capacity Builder Gel for Nails,Hard Gel Strengthen Set with Nail Forms Brush Nail File DIY for Nail Art Manicure Review Date: 2022/07/11 Store: Hzmirzk Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Hzmirzk', 'Included Components': 'Nail File', 'Item Weight': '60 Grams', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Package Dimensions': '7.17 x 3.27 x 2.92 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '779712404368'} Review Text: This hard gel/poly gel is great to use, especially when I don’t want to use duo forms. Lately I’ve been attaching shaped nail tips (like coffin or stilettos) and just adding hard gel over them instead of acrylic. This product has worked well for that purpose because it allows you to manipulate and shape the gel adequately over the tips at your own pace. Good buy!

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product.  I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. Review Title: Great For Duo Forms Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MRTREUP Chrome Nail Powder Palette , Metallic Mirror Effect Chrome Powder for Nails , Rose Gold Sliver Pink Holographic Nail Glitter Nail Pigment Powder for DIY Salon Nail Art Decorations Review Date: 2022/07/28 Store: MRTREUP Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 2.05 x 0.55 inches; 1.76 Ounces'} Review Text: I didn’t know what to expect from this product but I must say it really does deliver a cool chrome effect that can be incorporated with your nail design. It’s at a great price and has a variety of colors you can choose from. Overall I’m very happy with the purchase!

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product.  I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. Review Title: Cool Chrome Effects On Nails Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Review Title: Pricey But Works Well Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mocossmy Cross Nail Art Charms Decoration,72 PCS Gold Silver 3D Mini Metal Punk Vintage Cross Designs Mixed Types Retro Acrylic Nail Jewelry Accessories for Women Girls DIY Manicure Crafts Decoration Review Date: 2022/05/27 Store: Mocossmy Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {} Review Text: I got these nail charms to do my nails for a “throwback” 80s and 90s costume party and they were a big hit! I like that they come in either gold or silver to give you options. The little details count!

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product.  I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. Review Title: Cute Charms! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Builder Gel Nail Kit -2 oz Clear&Pink Nail Extension Gel Big Capacity Builder Gel for Nails,Hard Gel Strengthen Set with Nail Forms Brush Nail File DIY for Nail Art Manicure Review Date: 2022/07/11 Store: Hzmirzk Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Hzmirzk', 'Included Components': 'Nail File', 'Item Weight': '60 Grams', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Package Dimensions': '7.17 x 3.27 x 2.92 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '779712404368'} Review Text: This hard gel/poly gel is great to use, especially when I don’t want to use duo forms. Lately I’ve been attaching shaped nail tips (like coffin or stilettos) and just adding hard gel over them instead of acrylic. This product has worked well for that purpose because it allows you to manipulate and shape the gel adequately over the tips at your own pace. Good buy!

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product.  I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. **Summary of Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Self-Care Focus**: Notable purchases in skincare and personal grooming products indicate a preference for self-care, particularly for skin and nails.

- **Natural and Vegan Products**: A consistent interest in vegan and cruelty-free items, including skincare oils and lip products, highlights a preference for natural ingredients.

- **Nail Care Enthusiasm**: A strong trend in nail products, including various gel and dip nail polish kits, reflects a passion for nail art and DIY manicure options.

- **Color Variety and Quality**: Preference for diverse color selections, particularly in nail products, showcases an inclination towards vibrant and trendy shades suitable for various occasions.

- **Functionality**: The user values products that combine multiple benefits—moisturizing, exfoliating, protective qualities—suggesting a desire for high-quality multifunctional products.

- **Positive Experiences**: The consistently high ratings and positive feedback on purchased items suggest satisfaction with product performance, indicating discerning purchasing behavior.

- **Gifting Consideration**: Mention of gifting options indicates a tendency to consider others in purchasing decisions, likely influenced by seasonal trends.

Overall, the individual exhibits strong preferences for quality, versatility, and ethical product choices in their self-care routine, especially focused on skin and nail care.
